sentences.english: The government undertook that all shantytowns would be redeveloped before the year 2018.
sentences.chinese: 政府保證在2018年前對所有的棚戶區進行改造。

sentences.english: However, the core zone in the city shantytowns gradually disappears.
sentences.chinese: 然而，就在城市核心地帶的棚戶區逐漸消失的時候。

sentences.english: Baloyi works at his home in a shanty town outside Johannesburg.
sentences.chinese: Baloyi作品在他位於約翰內斯堡棚戶區外的家。

sentences.english: But in time, such shantytowns will simply become part of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 但是到那時，這樣的棚戶區將成爲景觀的一部分。
